value.fullName: The RLP does not contain seismic requirements.
value.label: The RLP does not contain seismic requirements.
The building either fully meets RLP seismic requirements or meets an exemption.
The building will be retrofitted to meet RLP seismic requirements it does not currently meet.

value.fullName: The building will be constructed to meet RLP seismic requirements.
value.label: The building will be constructed to meet RLP seismic requirements.
The building will not meet RLP seismic requirements.
